name: Patricia Gracia
welcome: Welcome to my portfolio, take a look at my recent projects üë©üèª‚Äçüíª

project1.title: Currency Converter App
project1.description: This project is built with React and uses the Frankfurter API to get the current exchange rates, so users always have the latest currency data. It has an easy-to-use interface that makes converting between different currencies simple. It includes a dynamic chart created with Chart.js.

project2.title: Waitlist Registration Form
project2.description: This project is built with Vite and incorporates EmailJS, a backend-as-a-service tool for sending emails directly from client or server-side code. The app has a simple and user-friendly interface, with cool CSS animations. Bootstrap is used to make sure it is responsive.

project3.title: Coffee Shop Homepage
project3.description: I created a one-page website inspired by the style of a coffee shop website I like. This project is built using React and has a modern and clean look. The design is responsive.

project4.title: Macrodata Refinement App (Severance)
project4.description: This project recreates the Macrodata Refinement software from the Apple TV+ series Severance, simulating the eerie and mysterious data-sorting experience portrayed in the show. It was built just for fun, with a focus on replicating the unsettling atmosphere of Lumon Industries. The number animations are currently hardcoded, and there‚Äôs plenty of room for improvement‚Äîadding interactive elements would make the experience more engaging.
